items.sentence: I\'ll get in touch with you by phone tomorrow.

I\'ve already told Tom that I want to do that.
Tom didn\'t need to finish that work by today.

Tom didn\'t want to give the wrong impression.
Tom doesn\'t allow his children to drink wine.

Tom knew Mary had been lying to him all along.

Tom pays rent on the first day of every month.

Tom probably knows more than he\'s telling us.
